tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: check out my Justin Bieber is﻿ gay video on page
I just﻿ came to see the car.
how﻿ much did it sell for?
Dont like the yellow, but i﻿ love this model.
$60,000 to put toward a﻿ more modern car. You mean $60,000 to buy 2 modern cars
looks like a﻿ space ship from.. 1955... go figure
first natgeo clip in a while that has more likes than dislikes!﻿ are folks finally comin around?
holy fuck my dad used to have a 1970 ford﻿ thunderbird
oh baby thats a sexy car !! i want but in pink !! yes yes﻿ yes
Go﻿ to Grand Prix with this :D
wtf voldemort what are you doing﻿ with harrys car?

Reviewer.Movies: anything made by andrei tarkovsky (the russian stanley kubrick)... and most of alfred hitchcock... but if i had to narrow it down, it would have to be 1. "BRIGADA" (russian, 2002) ... 2. "COME AND SEE" (russian, 1985)... 3. "Once Upon a Time in America" (1984) hands down my favorite movie ever, (better than the godfather imho), also 4."Heat" (1995), and for a comedy I would have to say 5."Dr. Strangelove" (1964), 6."Ravenous"(1999)... oh and 7. "Its a mad, mad, mad, mad, world" (1964) my current favorite tv show is "SHAMELESS"...
Reviewer.Music: different moods get me listening to different stuff, sometimes i listen to rock, mainly rap though, because i think a song isnt a song unless it has a meaning, and you cant have a meaning without words right... so trance/techno i dont really care for, because it has no lyrics, basically anything with a meaning, usually rap songs have more meaning than rock songs (lyrically speaking).. BUT.. I mean in the end of the day its whatever gets you going thru that particular day, thru that particular moment...w.e shitty mood ur in, and w.e cheers you up, on one day it can eminem and 2pac, the other it can be metallica and nirvana... but in the end of the day though, i would go with rock... especially metallica, and the doors... HUGE eminem fan though, i listen to his songs over and over and over... his songs helped me go thru some tough times in the "down" periods of my life... 2 artists I would wanna see in concert before I die is eminem and metallica... "TO BE A ROCK AND NOT TO ROLL...."

Reviewer.Books: Haven't read many books latley. I do read magazeines sometimes. I read the Bible though.
Reviewer.Job: I pack a job called ILVS where different colored floor mats I put a sequence number on each one. I pack multiple totes in quantities of 75 and 90 all day. I pack the shipments days ahead, My job isn't hard but it's repeative as hell. Paid personal days and vacation days are nice. I'm on vacation right as a typed this.
Reviewer.Movies: The family guy, Inuyasha, The Tim and Eric awesome show great job, and stand up comedy. Movies such as Blow, Rain man,Fear and loathing in Los Vegas True Lies and many other movies.
Reviewer.Music: Frank Zappa, Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, The Misfits, The locust, system of a down, Jim Croche, and the Doors and ect...

Reviewer.Books: twilight series, harry potter series, morgan ville vampire series, blue bloods seres, lord of the ring, generation dead , and so many more athors and series for me to name
Reviewer.Movies: good felleas the grinch who stole christmas, across the universe, the p-hantom of the opera,
Reviewer.Music: opera,musicals, heavy metal and a few pop
Reviewer.School: citrus hill high schoo 11 , riverside cummunity college

Reviewer.Music: Lamb of God, Underoath, A Day To Remember, We Came As Romans, Jake Owen, The Devil Wears Prada, The Icarus Account, The After Party, Confide, Attack Attack, Of Mice & Men, Heaven Shall Burn, Breaking Benjamin, Run Kid Run, Haste The Day, Inhale Exhale, Brian "Head" Welch, Blink-182, Five Finger Death Punch, Brad Paisley, Misery Signals, Billy Currington, Hollywood Undead, Mayday Parade, and a bunch more country and rock and electronic and the list goes on and on and on
